text:
TREATMENT RESULTS FROM FRANCE
Interesting results from France on #hydroxychloroquine That compound & #chloroquine by themselves show promise 
The treatment group received 
200mg of hydroxychloroquine sulfate 3X a day, & 6 of those patients were also given 500mg #Azithromycin 🙏⚕️ https://t.co/ZmrARfpNBg https://t.co/DbhDXBMEnf
